Children with either missing or invalid age, sex, height, weight, or geography are not included in counts and prevalence estimates.
The method used to calculate the standard errors are documented in the technical documentation.
The population estimates are based on age-race-sex-location specific counts from the 2014-2018 American Community Survey Five-year Estimates released by the Census Bureau on December 19, 2019.
The method used to calculate age-adjusted prevalence is documented in the technical documentation.
